messages.subject: Re: Looking for fun things to do in the Santa Fe/Chimayo area

messages.messageBody:
This question isn't appropriate for this list. If anyone has ideas, mail them directly to mfisher@...


--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "mdfisher23" <mfisher@...> wrote:
>
> Greetings. My family and I are headed to New Mexico in two weeks. We'll be staying in Chimayo and we plan to hit Bandelier and Santa Fe. We have been researching fun things to do in the area and would love to hear from anyone who has come upon something they loved. My kids are 9 and 7.
> Thanks in advance!
>
> Marcia
>

messages.subject: Looking for fun things to do in the Santa Fe/Chimayo area
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings.  My family and I are headed to New Mexico in two weeks.  We ll be staying in Chimayo and we plan to hit Bandelier and Santa Fe.  We have been
messages.messageBody:
Greetings. My family and I are headed to New Mexico in two weeks. We'll be staying in Chimayo and we plan to hit Bandelier and Santa Fe. We have been researching fun things to do in the area and would love to hear from anyone who has come upon something they loved. My kids are 9 and 7.
Thanks in advance!

Marcia
